message.entry: Unable to create an action client with action name {0} and type {1}.
The {0} server did not become available during {1} seconds. Try a longer timeout.
The function {0} timed out after waiting {1} seconds for a response. Try a longer timeout.
Unable to send goal from action client with action name {0} and type {1}. Ensure that action server is available and goal message matches action type.
Unable to cancel goal from action client with action name {0} and type {1}.
Invalid timestamp input. Input timestamp must be a struct with int32 field 'sec', and uint32 field 'nanosec'.

An error occurred while shutting down the action client. The persistent connection to the action server might still be active. To ensure that the connection to the server is severed, shut down the node that this action client is connected to.
Error occurred while requesting information on the ROS 2 action client.
Goal handle does not belong to this action client object. Use the client object this goal sent out from.
Error parsing callback for '{0}'. Specify callback functions with name-value arguments '{1}' in '{2}' object creation for code generation.
Goal UUID is empty. Result is not applicable for goals rejected by action server.
Goal has been rejected by action server.
Action {0} with type {1} is already on the ROS 2 network. Try creating the action client with type {1}, not {2}.
